title: AI Will Create New Stars Who Will NOT Be People, Claims Shekhar Kapur - EXCLUSIVE
description: In an exclusive chat with Group Editor-in-Chief of Times Now Navika Kumar, filmmaker Shekhar Kapur claimed AI will soon create new stars who won’t be human. He said AI actors won’t demand fees or skip shoots, calling artificial intelligence an opportunity for India., Bollywood, Times Now
content:
Shekhar Kapur Claims AI Will Create New Stars - EXCLUSIVE

title: Is this AI-generated? French President Macron shares new pic with PM Modi; says 'Ready for the AI Impact Summit!'
description: French President Emmanuel Macron's visit to India saw him connect with Prime Minister Narendra Modi, sharing an AI-generated image on X. The leaders engaged in extensive bilateral discussions covering defense, education, clean energy, and aviation. Macron's presence also marked the inauguration of the Franco-Indian Center for Artificial Intelligence in Health, highlighting a focus on innovation.
content:

title: The Greatest Reset: System Theorist Vatsal Soin's 0→1 Doctrine Ends Global Debate— Neutralizing AI, AGI, and Quantum Threats to Secure Absolute Human Sovereignty
description: Today's Artificial Intelligence is a super-fast "Guessing Machine." It looks at millions  of old examples and makes a "best guess." title: Saudi's Humain invested $3 billion in xAI's Series E funding round
description: Saudi Arabia is boosting its artificial intelligence ambitions as it seeks to ​capitalize on the growing ⁠demand for ‌compute capacity and diversify revenue ​sources ​away from oil. The investment builds ⁠on the partnership announced between Humain and ​xAI in November at the ​U.S.-Saudi Investment Forum where both firms said they would jointly develop 500 megawatts of AI data center infrastructure.

title: India leapfrogged in mobile internet, same is going to be true for AI: Qualcomm CEO
description: Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon sees India ready to lead in artificial intelligence. He compares this to India's past success with mobile internet and smartphones. Amon believes AI will bring disruption and create opportunities for India. Qualcomm is excited to support India's growth in AI and its global footprint.

title: AI Impact Summit 2026: India sets Guinness World Record with 2.5 lakh AI responsibility pledges in 24 hours
description: India sets a Guinness World Record with 250,946 pledges in 24 hours under the IndiaAI Mission’s AI Responsibility campaign. Announced at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, the milestone highlights the country’s push for ethical, inclusive and responsible artificial intelligence adoption.
content: India has secured a place in the Guinness World Records after nearly a quarter of a million people signed up to an artificial intelligence responsibility campaign within 24 hours, Union Minister for Electronics and Information Technology Ashwini Vais... [2239 chars]

title: Starboard presses Riot Platforms to speed up AI data center push
description: Activist investor Starboard Value on Wednesday pressed Riot Platforms to speed up AI data center deals, saying the bitcoin miner is well-positioned to capitalize on booming demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:
Shares of Riot rose about 5% in premarket trading.
